title: EPS Packaging
metaDescription: EPS packaging for product protection during transport. Light and resistant, they are customizable to meet the needs of various sectors.

hero.title: EPS Packaging
hero.description: EPS packaging for product protection during transport. Light and resistant, they are customizable to meet the needs of various sectors.

categoryDescription: Our EPS packaging offers customized protection for industrial and commercial products, with options such as corner protectors, molds and beads.

products.name: EPS Packaging
products.description: Complete EPS packaging solutions for protection and transport.

benefits.title: Efficient Protection
benefits.description: Cushions impacts and vibrations, preserving the product during transport and storage.

benefits.title: Lightness and Economy
benefits.description: Reduces the total weight of packaging, facilitating handling and optimizing logistics costs.

benefits.title: High Versatility
benefits.description: Can be molded in various formats, adapting to different types of products.
